name: ilex-preonboarding-tool
description: Pre-onboarding test application for Institutional Lending Exchange

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd netlify && npm install && cd ../client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: cd netlify && npm install && cd functions && npm install && cd ../../client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build

author: Institutional Lending Exchange
